attributes.action: Government to regulate the Motor Insurance Industry
attributes.additional_details: This petition has been raised to urge the government to look into the Motor Insurance Industry processes and quoting policy.  The government insist that it's a legal requirement to have motor insurance, yet they allow the industry to charge what they like for the "privilege" of driving on the roads.  If insurance is a legal requirement then it must be made affordable to all.

rejection.details: The insurance industry is already regulated by the Financial Services Authority, which reports to H M Treasury.
